Literature.Title: Ultrashort Cationic Lipopeptides-Effect of N-Terminal Amino Acid and Fatty Acid Type on Antimicrobial Activity and Hemolysis
Literature.Author: Neubauer D, Jaskiewicz M, Bauer M, Golacki K, Kamysz W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=128µg/ml)
